channel.title: Open Source on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Contributions
item.description: I have contributed to open source in the following places: Writing a blog for SRA VJTI: gdb-for-noobs PR#1. Added instructions for using an ADC library for UncleRus/esp-idf-lib in PR#163. Tried to add librobotcontrol support to the BeagleBone AI in PR#204. Added a device tree overlay for the audio cape on the BeagleBone AI using the Cape Compatiblity layer and merged to the official BeagleBoard-Device Trees repo in PR#33. Fixed issue#34 in the audio overlay for the BBAI that was causing a minor offset in the output audio frequency in PR#36.
